title: Exactly where was I"toxic" to anyone here to get perma banned
body:
So after I got a 14 day suspension I made it my goal to be positive and communicate. I honestly don't see anywhere in this log where I was exactly toxic and I don't know one lane where I was offensive or said any harsh words, I think the punishment system is a joke after this tbh

Game 1
Pre-Game
Dronos: just dodge the hook boys
In-Game
Dronos: we gotta good team just dont feed lux and dont overextend
Dronos: a knock off one
Dronos: i barely play hec
Dronos: thx
Dronos: i shoukld have gotten arcade tho
Dronos: guys plz
Dronos: gg
Dronos: sona player
Dronos: \its true
Dronos: cause your playing sona
Dronos: no pressure can be dealt
Dronos: then stay under tower?
Dronos: not hard to do
Dronos: back
Dronos: thats so cool
Dronos: we finaly get a break
Dronos: and that shit happens
Dronos: fun game
Dronos: nice
Dronos: ff
Dronos: over before my first clear....
Dronos: oh no wonder
Dronos: ez took tp
Dronos: lets ff
Dronos: all lanes lost
Dronos: nice team
Dronos: sona plz stop talking'
Dronos: dude u picked sona into blitz
Dronos: lol i could have played my main and it would be the same result
Dronos: i cant do anythigngt when my bot cant dodge hooks
Dronos: how am i being toxic
Dronos: i said sona into blitz was a bad pick
Dronos: ok im just nit
Dronos: i actyally dont understand
Dronos: how yall lost lane this bad
Dronos: ezreal with tp
Dronos: who takes tp on an adc?
Dronos: its easy to jungle when your laners dont feed
Dronos: u guys made it impossible for me to anything
Dronos: garen ulted str8 away but im  trolling right
Dronos: i started that fight
Dronos: they literally balmed me for evberythiung
Dronos: and when i said to them play safe they think im being toxic from that'
Dronos: yes u did
Dronos: u blamed me for everything and u took to all chat for them to back u up
Dronos: yeaaa
Dronos: if u wanna talk it over im done
Dronos: ok
Dronos: u guys wer like 0-2 before i can ever clear anything
Dronos: we have 8 kills
Post-Game
Dronos: sona u need help

replies.body: You gave up (saying "ff" repeatedly), blamed your team for the loss, and told your teammate to stop talking. None of that is positive or helpful, and it bothers people to have to see it in chat. Hence your ban.
Your 14-day ban was a sign from the heavens to stop shotcalling, telling your team what to do, and blaming them for mistakes and "losing lane."

Exactly where? When you kept harpin on your own teammates. Why you do this? You just want to tilt your own team? Its so dumb to do. Do you just yearn for drama online? I dont get people like you... just play the game. Chat shouldnt be an issue. Why do so many people have an obsession with chat? Too much social media making you think expressing your opinion on everything is necessary or something, idk.
lol a duo can go ezreal adc and support heal flash bot- its actually a common thing to sustain
The IFS is hyper strict after a 14 day ban. You were barely negative in your logs but still negative nonetheless, thus resulting in your ban
